about.title: Learn more about who we are
about.section_content: DIGIMYTCH is an online platform that offers design and marketing courses to anyone who wants to learn from experienced trainers. We are reshaping the way businesses, designers, and marketing specialists connect. Our platform will match recruiters with designers and marketing specialists who have the appropriate expertise and availability. We help recruiters hire the best based on the skills they have been taught by our trainers through paid online courses and by refining existing ones.
about.vision_content: This will be the solution to share one's skills with the community and teach people the 100% practical way (with real projects) of having a job as a designer or marketer in a company, not just theoretical. It will be the one-stop-shop for all recruiters looking for competent and qualified candidates for their design or marketing positions.

footer.contact: Do not hesitate to send us an e-mail for any request for additional information.

form.body: You have successfully subscribed to the training
